abstract: 'Royal road' takes a look at both the public-facing activities of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth (the Queen Mother) during WWII, as well as a showing a glimpse of the royal family's private life in the gardens at Windsor.
description: A war-time newsreel study of King and Queen of England [George VI] carrying out their duties as sovereigns, visiting the blitzed areas of England during World War II.
